Variant Name: Verona - 48 inch Designer Low Profile Under Cabinet Range Hood with 1200 CFM, Stainless Steel Baffle Filters, LED Lighting in Stainless Steel (Designer / Hood / Stainless Steel) - VELP4810GSS
Variant HTML:
With its sleek 10-inch profile and under-cabinet installation, the 48-inch Designer Low Profile Under Cabinet Range Hood by Verona VELP4810GSS is perfect for any kitchen. Its powerful 4-speed, 1200 CFM ventilation fan makes short work of grease and smoke. The hood's stainless-steel baffle filters are safe to wash in the dishwasher.

Range Hood, 48" Designer Series, Low Profile

The 48-inch Designer Series low-profile range hood by Verona comes with four adjustable fan speeds, a timer for automatic shutoff, four LED lights, and stainless steel baffle filters.


Installation beneath the cabinet

With its 10-inch low profile height, this Verona hood is perfect for a stylish and practical installation beneath an upper cabinet.


5-Button Illuminated Keyboard

The fan speed, LED work lights, and auto shut-off timer can be easily controlled with a 5-button backlit keypad made of stainless steel.


Some other features are:

  • A dishwasher-safe baffle filter made of stainless steel with an anti-grease coating.
  • The kitchen's powerful grease, smoke, and odor ventilation system features a 1200 CFM motor.
  • A maintenance light for the grease filter.




Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Maintenance Light for Grease Filters
    • To keep the cooker hood components clean and free from foul odors caused by grease buildup, the hood will automatically let you know when the metal grease filter needs to be cleaned. This filter is specifically designed to trap grease in the air.
  • Postponed Power Disconnect
    • Turns off the hood automatically after a predetermined amount of time to eliminate any remaining smells.
  • Signal for Changing the Charcoal Filter
    • Keep yourself apprised of when the charcoal filters need to be changed for the best air filtration with the built-in indicator.
  • 1,200 cubic feet per minute
    • Offers strong airflow to efficiently extinguish cooking odors, grease, and smoke.
